description:
Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates` efforts to save her with a ship to call their own - the Going Merry!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How It Ends!
Explosão de Raiva! O Final da Batalha Entre Kuro e Luffy!
Ikari Bakuhatsu! Kuro VS Luffy Kecchaku no Yukue!
L`explosion de colère ! Kuro contre Luffy : le combat final

ปิดฉากการต่อส!ู้ คุโระปะทะลูฟี่!

愤怒爆发！克洛VS路飞 最终结局！
